Navigation
Name Rascal/Expressions/Values/Set/size
Synopsis Determine the number of elements in a set.
Function int size(set[&T] st)
Usage import Set;
Examples 
rascal>import Set;
ok
rascal>size({1,2,3,4});
int: 4
rascal>size({"elephant", "zebra", "snake"});
int: 3
rascal>size({});
int: 0

Questions
Question [1]. 
size({  }) == 2
